column2: A recovered anchor from the USS Arizona is on display at this memorial's visitor center
column4: You can travel Mountain Thunder Plantation on the "Big Island", in the area that gives this coffee its name
column6: This tower, in downtown Honolulu, was built to say welcome to tourists arriving in the 1920s and '30s
column8: In 2013 the beautiful Kilauea Point Lighthouse on the north end of Kauai was renamed to honor this late senator
column10: This royal palace completed by King David Kalakaua in 1882 had electricity installed before the White House
